column2: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! wants to disinherit §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! by removing a certain item necessary for §Y[This.GetHerHis]§! coming of age ceremony.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has decided that bringing [From.GetPossPronoun] child §Y[This.GetFirstName]§! into this world was a mistake.
Rally support amongst the other vassals of [This.Holder.GetTitledName] in an attempt to stage a coup and seize control of the [This.GetFullBaseName].
